This Act may be cited as

toc-entry.#text: Subtitle A—Access to voluntary prekindergarten for low- and moderate-Income families
Sec. 114. Allotments and reservation of funds.
Sec. 123. Prohibition of required participation or use of funds for assessments.
Sec. 124. Coordination with Head Start programs.
Sec. 125. Technical assistance in program administration.
TITLE III—Maternal, Infant, and Early Childhood Home Visiting program

text.#text: The purposes of this subtitle are to—

establish a
			 Federal-State partnership to provide access to high-quality public
			 prekindergarten programs for all children from low-income and
			 moderate-income
			 families to ensure that the children enter kindergarten prepared for
			 success;

broaden
			 participation in such programs to include children from additional
			 middle-class
			 families; and

promote access to
			 full-day kindergarten, and high-quality early childhood education programs
			 and
			 settings for children.
